It contains some familiar interfaces along with some new functionality and a new worklist tool called Workspace. Please see the table of contents below for a list of training documentations suitable for both new and existing users.          Overview - A basic overview of the new BPM Budget Modification System.   Submitting a Request - A walkthrough on how to create and submit new requests for budget modifications.   The BudMod Form - An explanation of the various fields on the Bud Mod form and how to fill them out.   Upload, Download, Copy, Print - An explantion on some of the more complex functionality available.   Inquire and Search - How to navigate and utilize the robust search functionality within BudMod.   Managing Your Workspace - A guide on approving requests and managing workflow items within Workspace. NYC Events...                                                                   Each week, Ticket Central offers discounted tickets to Broadway and Off-Broadway shows, sports games, and other NYC events. View the full list            ...and much more!                  Never pay full price for a movie again! Save up to $5 per ticket by using Ticket Central's movie passes. Read More                    Ticket Central can help you purchase group tickets to virtually any event in the NYC area! Read More                    Check out our Discount Finder for insider deals, discounts and tips for scoring tickets on the cheap for events in the NYC area Read More                    Reach over 32,000 NYU students, staff, faculty and alumni via email and social media Read More                                           For the most up-to-date deals, discounts and freebies, follow us on Facebook and Twitter !             NYU Card Information   Your valid NYUCard or Alumni ID is required for all transactions and services at NYU Ticket Central.   Only NYUCard holders with full university privileges (dark purple ID color) and Alumni with valid Alumni ID may purchase tickets to theatre, performing arts, sports and other special events, or claim free tickets to shows or movies on the first day of sale or distribution.   Please note that certain offers and deals are only available with an active NYU Home account.   Learn more about NYUCard »                           Mailing List   With so much going on at NYU Ticket Central, the best way to keep informed of our specials, discounts, bargains and give-aways is to join our email listserv!     How to join:   You can enter your email address here and you will be added to the listserv automatically.                                                Email:           Please check your spelling and hit submit only once!                          Submit                          Contact Us   Box Office Location:  566 LaGuardia Place  (Side entrance of the Kimmel Center)   Phone: 212.998.4941  Fax: 212.995.4961  Email: boxoffice@nyu.edu   Fall/Spring Hours:   Tuesday – Saturday,  noon–6:00pm   Closed on University holidays and breaks                                            NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
